value:
No matter the world, no matter the
era...I will never forgive those who
make a mockery of what is just.

Magvel is simply crawling with foul
creatures. I'm glad to say it's very
different here!$k$pBut it's such a shame that, even here,
people must still fight one another...

Oh, my. There are dark circles under
your eyes. You had better get more
sleep, $Nu!

Are you lost as well? Castles are
always so tricky to navigate, no
matter the world, aren't they?$k$pIf you would, please guide me to my
chambers.

Take that! And that! Watch as I
wield my staff with such grace!
I'll whack our enemies with it.

Are you, by any chance, a friend of
$Nf?$k$pNo, you need not say a thing. I can
tell. An endeavor with a noble goal
naturally draws comrades in arms!

As befits my refinement and
grace. It is providence!

I've grown stronger. My mother
and father would praise me.

This must be a test from the
gods!

I will show you the splendor that is
L'Arachel in action! Bear witness!

Friends of justice! Allies of
righteousness and order! Know that I,
L'Arachel, have arrived!

So this is where you've been! There's
something we need to talk about, and
that's you.$k$pIn the world I come from, monsters
crept from the Darkling Woods and
beset the people.$k$pMy parents took it upon themselves to
defend the citizenry, and I am told
that this is how they lost their lives.$k$pThey are the pride of Rausten. They
are my pride, too.$k$pLike them, you're on a grand mission
to bring righteousness and order to
this world. I can see that.$k$pThen we are agreed! You had
better not go dying in battle on
me. Do I have your word?
えいっ
えいえいえいっ
きゃああっ！
まあっ…こんな…
I've passed my judgment!
Watch this!
I have arrived!
I cannot abide this!
This will...never do...
ふふっ
That's right! I am Rausten's own pr— Oopsie. Almost revealed my secret identity!
Wh-what is the meaning of this? Explain yourself!
I am L'Arachel, the "beautiful princess of peerless beauty." You would do well to remember that.
Rather than lament what you do not possess, you should treasure what you do.
That I would be called a Hero... Ahh, how enchanting!
Father... Mother... Am I doing the right thing?
I'll allow you the pleasure of my company. You'll be spending all your time with me.
I see...
Dashing!
Here I go!
